full_text:

2    I mean, I'm sorry, he is circumcised, my bad. He's circumcised, a
3    hundred and ten percent sure. A matter of fact, he has some sort of
4    birth defect. On his thing. I don't know what it is [giggles] I've
5    never like really looked at it, because I've never done anything
6    where I had to touch it. I've never touched it out of the whole time
7    I worked for him I never touched his penis. Like, he I'm pretty
8    sure he he rubbed it against me, but I've never ever been like, okay
9    I'm letting you do this or I'm gonna do this to you. Um, it's really
10   weirdly shaped. I don't know, do you want me to like tell you
11   this?
12   
13   DETECTIVE:    Yeah, please.
14   
15   Is this proof? Like,
16   DETECTIVE:    I do, I do want you to tell me.
17   
18   Cause I feel like [sighs]
19   
20   DETECTIVE:    I know, I know.
21   
22   FRIEND:    You're talking to your girlfriends. Don't think of them as guys.
23   You're talking to your girlfriends,
24   
25   [giggle] Okay [giggle]. I'm just really embarrassed.
26   
27   DETECTIVE:    I know, it's okay.
28   
29   Um, it's like a teardrop, like a drop of water. It's really fat at the
30   bottom and skinny at the top where its attached. And, he can never
31   get fully hard, ever. Like, I just could tell by looking at it, like, by
32   looking you can obviously tell if you're hard or not and I could tell
33   that he wasn't.
34   
35   DETECTIVE:    Okay.
36   
37   So I don't know if that's some sort of thing that's wrong with him,
38   but it definitely was not normal. And I have, I mean it's not like I
39   sleep around, you know, but I've seen, and it was not normal.
40   
41   DETECTIVE:    Right, in movies and stuff.
42   
43   Yeah.
44   
45
